subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal won his first hardcourt tournament in more than 11 months, beating Juan Martín del Potro, and Maria Sharapova beat Caroline Wozniacki.
snippet: Rafael Nadal won his first hardcourt tournament in more than 11 months, beating Juan Martín del Potro, and Maria Sharapova beat Caroline Wozniacki.
